title: KHR_audio_emitter Audio Source
description: Audio sources reference audio data and define playback properties for it. Audio sources may be used by zero to many audio emitters.

autoPlay.description: Whether or not to play the specified audio when the glTF is loaded.

gain.description: Unitless multiplier against original audio file volume for determining audio source loudness.

loop.description: Whether or not to loop the specified audio when finished.

audio.description: The index of the audio data assigned to this clip.
